data_config.description: Configuration for data directories and file lists

image_directory.description: Path to the directory containing input image volumes (e.g., .mhd or .hdr files).

label_directory.description: Path to the directory containing ground truth label volumes. Required for training and optional evaluation.

split_file.description: Optional path to a JSON file defining 'train' and 'eval' file lists.

select_files.description: Explicit list of filenames to process. If provided, overrides all other filtering.

augmentation.description: Whether to apply random data augmentation (rotation, noise) during training.

pca_components.description: Number of principal components for the Active Shape Model.

subsample_points.description: Number of surface points to sample per case for PCA training.

n_estimators.description: Number of trees in the Random Forest classifier.

max_depth.description: Maximum depth of the Random Forest trees.

subsample_voxels_per_case.description: Max number of voxels to sample per training case to balance speed and memory.

training_proximity_mm.description: Proximity (in mm) to bone surfaces for selecting cartilage training samples.

use_random_walker.description: Whether to apply Random Walker refinement to the initial classifier output.

random_walker_beta.description: Beta parameter for the Random Walker (controls edge sensitivity).

inference_proximity_mm.description: Proximity (in mm) to detected bone surfaces for cartilage classification.

perform_evaluation.description: If true, the inference script will attempt to calculate Dice scores against ground truth.

model_directory.description: Directory where trained models (.joblib) will be saved or loaded from.

prediction_directory.description: Directory where predicted segmentation volumes will be saved.

evaluation_report_path.description: Path to save the final quantitative evaluation report (JSON).
